description: Dying rabbits: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) - a(n-7).
references: J. H. E. Cohn, Letter to the editor, Fib. Quart. 2 (1964), 108.
V. E. Hoggatt, Jr. and D. A. Lind, The dying rabbit problem, Fib. Quart. 7 (1969), 482-487.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,0,0,0,0,-1)
crossrefs: See A000045 for the Fibonacci numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
